UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: An apolipoprotein E mimetic peptide with activities against multidrug-resistant bacteria and immunomodulatory effects.
Literature.Author: Wang CQ, Yang CS, Yang Y, Pan F, He LY, Wang AM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=12µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=>32µg/ml)
